text: Selena Gomez has finally confirmed her reunion with her first love, Justin Bieber. The actress, 25, opened up about the men in her life in an in - depth interview with Billboard, telling the magazine that she and her ex The Weeknd ended their 10 month relationship as'best friends.'But Selena was vague as she addressed her relationship with Justin, insisting she will always have a soft spot for someone who has played a significant role in her life.'I cherish people who have really impacted my life': Selena Gomez has finally confirmed her reunion with her first love, Justin Bieber'I'm 25. I'm not 18, or 19, or 20,'she told the magazine of reconnecting with Justin.'I cherish people who have really impacted my life. '
